items.name: Apocalypse Hold
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks
55% increased Critical Strike Chance during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Glimpse of Chaos
implicitMods: Socketed Skill Gems get a 80% Cost & Reservation Multiplier
explicitMods: 32% increased maximum Life and reduced Fire Resistance
40% increased maximum Mana and reduced Cold Resistance
30% increased Global maximum Energy Shield and reduced Lightning Resistance
flavourText: Man retains sanity and strives toward civilisation
only under the blessed veil of ignorance.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby Allies have +2% to Critical Strike Multiplier
You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 16 to 248 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 221 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Ivory Tower
explicitMods: +32 to maximum Energy Shield per 100 Reserved Life
Regenerate 2.2% of Energy Shield per second
Chaos Damage is taken from Mana before Life
flavourText: The mind is a filter through which anarchy becomes order.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both a channelling skill and a non-channelling spell skill to work. The channelling skill will trigger a spell periodically while channelling. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: Supported Triggered Spells deal 30% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger a Supported Spell every 0.35 seconds while Channelling Supported Skills
Supported Channelling Skills deal 10% increased Damage
Supported Triggered Spells deal 10% increased Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells that hit enemies. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

Supported Skills have Added Spell Damage equal to 135% of
Damage of Equipped One Handed Melee Weapons
If two Weapons are Equipped, each contributes 60% as much Added Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies, making those hits penetrate enemy lightning resistance.

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Channelling, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel this skill to move towards a targeted location while spinning, building up stages while constantly attacking enemies in an area around you. While channelling this skill, you cannot be knocked back.
explicitMods: 8% increased Area of Effect per 0.1 metre additional Melee Strike Range
Gains 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while Channelling
Lose 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while not Channelling
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Coruscating Elixir
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield during effect

Removes all but one Life on use
Removed life is Regenerated as Energy Shield over 2 seconds
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Let blood sear in your veins,
Let the pain push outwards and turn away your enemy's blows.

items.name: Gloom Clasp
flavourText: When we free ourselves from the shackles
of civilised existence
we learn to feed and run and breathe
as the First Ones have always done.
- The Wolven King

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 134 to 200 Base Off Hand Physical Damage
5 to 7 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance

5% chance to receive additional Jewellery when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist

2% chance in Heists for Items to drop fully linked
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

craftedMods: Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Shaper's Touch
explicitMods: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Attack Speed

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Lightning, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their lightning resistance and giving them a chance to be shocked when hit.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -36% to Lightning Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Shock
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% reduced Area of Effect
Supported Skills have 19% increased Aura effect
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 10% increased Effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.
explicitMods: 20% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies in Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.38% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 910 maximum Life per Stage
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 730 Energy Shield per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rathpith Globe
implicitMods: You take 27% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes
explicitMods: Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.
explicitMods: Buff grants +26% Chance to Block Spell Damage while holding a Shield
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which significantly lowers your maximum Energy Shield to transform your equipped weapons into Swords formed from that energy. Casting the spell again removes the buff. Requires a Non-Bow weapon. This skill cannot be triggered.
explicitMods:
Energy Blades have minimum Lightning Damage equal to 2% of Energy Shield, plus 13
Energy Blades have maximum Lightning Damage equal to 40% of Energy Shield, plus 250
Two Handed Energy Blades have 70% more Lightning Damage
Energy Blades have 10% increased Critical Strike Chance
Buff grants 50% less Maximum Energy Shield
